name: 1 stop
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="onename"
	label="Enter some text"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_location"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="id"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=location&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=id"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=targetview.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=targetview.edit&id={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	titleSelect="Select Targetview"
	titleNew="New Targetview"
	titleEdit="Edit Targetview"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="false"
	edit="false"
	clear="true"
	required="false"
	class="input-large"
	description="Enter some description"
	hint="Select a Targetview"
	default=""
	readonly="false"
	disabled="false"
	showon=""
/>
